title: Crime Alert 08.12.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.12.21
description:
Man gets angry after being thrown out of a bar. He tries to run down another patron and hits one of his friends, killing him. Suspect flees to another state after killing three members of his family.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
